sentences.en: He cracked jokes and talked about beer and girls.
sentences.cn: 他爱说笑话，喜欢谈论啤酒和姑娘。

sentences.en: He stood in my kitchen drinking beer, rambling on about Lillian.
sentences.cn: 他站在我的厨房里喝着啤酒，漫无边际地讲着有关莉莲的事情。

sentences.en: He tossed Malone a can of beer, and took one himself.
sentences.cn: 他扔给马隆一罐啤酒，自己也拿了一罐。

sentences.en: He was aware of the stink of stale beer on his breath.
sentences.cn: 他知道自己嘴里有股变味啤酒的馊味。

sentences.en: He was short and fat, with a large beer belly.
sentences.cn: 他又矮又胖，挺着个大啤酒肚。

sentences.en: He watched the barman prepare the beer he had ordered.
sentences.cn: 他看着酒吧招待员备好他点的啤酒。

sentences.en: I decided it wouldn't be tactful to order another beer.
sentences.cn: 我想了想，觉得再要啤酒就有点过分了。

sentences.en: life isn't all beer and skittles.
sentences.cn: 生活并非只是玩乐和享受。

sentences.en: Men were standing around, swilling beer and occasionally leering at passing females.
sentences.cn: 男人们吊儿郎当地站着，大口大口地喝着啤酒，偶尔还对着路过的女性猥亵地笑。

sentences.en: People are still hanging out drinking beer, maybe shooting some pool.
sentences.cn: 人们仍聚在那里喝啤酒，可能还会打会儿台球。

sentences.en: Spencer waded through the debris of broken chairs and beer bottles.
sentences.cn: 斯潘塞艰难地迈过一堆破椅子和碎啤酒瓶。

sentences.en: Such roles are small beer compared with the fame she once enjoyed.
sentences.cn: 和她曾经享有的名气相比，这样的角色真的算不了什么。

sentences.en: The new invention ensures the beer keeps a full, frothy head.
sentences.cn: 这项新发明能保证啤酒始终保持丰富的泡沫。

sentences.en: There were two empty beer bottles on the table.
sentences.cn: 桌子上有两个空啤酒瓶。

sentences.en: This enzyme would make the filtration of beer easier.
sentences.cn: 这种酶会使啤酒更容易过滤。

sentences.en: Wade walked quickly to the refrigerator and pulled out another beer.
sentences.cn: 韦德快步走到冰箱边又拿出一罐啤酒。

sentences.en: We sell draught beer (=  beer served from a large container, not a bottle  ) .
